Provide extension agents with training and capacity building. Develop extension manuals and curricula.
P2. P7. Train extension agents to evaluate and advise producers on the development of silvopastoral systems, sustainable rangeland and pasture management, and sustainable use of water resources. P7. Train extension agents to collect data on grassland degradation, biodiversity, and other environmental indicators. P7. Embed environmental management practices in animal production training courses and manuals.
